title: League keeps crashing during champ select
body: During champion select, after I ban a champion, the game will freeze while in the animation of "slicing" the champion that was banned. Sometimes after I lock in my champion, my game goes crazy and the portraits on my team disappear, the options for my runes/masteries/summoner spells go blank empty boxes with no text (until i hover over them then they magically reappear). Sometimes this glitch gets me kicked from games as I cannot choose  a champ, or sometimes I can have my crashed game window open long enough until after champ select is over and then I can restart my game and reload. This is getting really annoying since I have a built in mini-game within League of Legends that can cost me LP and time ): Please help me fix this issue, mucho annoyingo, thanks in advance

replies.body:
It seems like this might be an issue where your network is having a hard time keeping you connected to everyone else in the match. Once you're in champion select, there is a service that connects you to the other people in the lobby so that you can all see what each other picks and bans. 

Since your issue starts popping up when you ban/lock in a champion, check out our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure that you keep a stable connection through champion select.

Hit me back up if that doesn't help!
This helped so much, the LoL client as a whole feels so much smoother as well, although that might be a placebo effect. But nonetheless, thanks, This was very helpful
